data.text: Fuwulani kwa Mulungu ndi chimwemwe, dziko lonse lapansi!
Imbani ulemerero wa dzina lake;
Nenani kwa Mulungu, “Ntchito zanu ndi zoopsa ndithu!
Dziko lonse lapansi limaweramira inu;
Bwerani mudzaone zimene Mulungu wachita,
Iye anasandutsa nyanja kukhala malo owuma,
Iye amalamulira ndi mphamvu zake mpaka muyaya,
Tamandani Mulungu wathu, inu mitundu ya anthu,
Iye watchinjiriza miyoyo yathu
Pakuti Inu Mulungu munatiyesa;
Inu mwatilowetsa mʼndende
Inu munalola kuti anthu akwere pa mitu yathu;
Ine ndidzabwera ku Nyumba yanu ndi nsembe zopsereza
Malumbiro amene milomo yanga inalonjeza
Ndidzapereka nsembe nyama zonenepa kwa Inu
Bwerani ndipo mudzamve inu nonse amene mumaopa Mulungu.
Ndinafuwula kwa Iye ndi pakamwa panga,
Ndikanasekerera tchimo mu mtima mwanga
koma ndithu Mulungu wamvetsera
Matamando akhale kwa Mulungu
